page.title: 08MOTORWAY M42.
page.content: Before the{construction}starts they have to level the surface with{Motor- {scrapers.}One Motor-scraper costs {Â£100,000.}One tyre costs{Â£3000}.There is 20 kilometers of motorway from {Polsworth to Appleby Magna}where it is due to end in 1986.This section of the the motorway is 20Km. long and will cost Â£20 million.On site there are 20 motor- scrapers, 2 tar layers and 1 rock trencher.In addition there are 8 tracked diggers.There are about 10 bulldozers and about 2 Road rollers Altogether there will be 10 bridges on the motorway.5 roads will come off the roundabout at Appleby Fields.{The {bridges are in a list from North to {South:}INTERCHANGE(APPLEBY MAGNA), DINGLE LANE,APPLEBY FIELDS,SALT-STREET AUSTRY LANE,NEWTON REGIS, BRAMCOT WOOD BRAMCOTE HALL,NEWPOTFORD.
